input_dim.cmt: input image dimension row X cols this can't be changed

n_padding_bits.cmt: number of padding layers, can be changed the image is padded with 0

n_filter_layer_1.cmt: number of filters in cnn layer 1, dynamic

filter_size_layer_1.cmt: dimension of filter in layer 1, by default 7x7 can be changed

filter_stride.cmt: moving stride try keeping it fix, but if wished to change then make sure that the conv operation output should have the integral dimension using the formula
